name: Niagara
description: Visit the majestic Niagara Falls. Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring beauty of one of the world's most iconic natural wonders.

name: Miami
description: Experience the vibrant culture and beautiful beaches of Miami. Lively nightlife and diverse cuisine await at every turn.

name: Las Vegas
description: Explore the dazzling lights and non-stop entertainment of Las Vegas. A city that never sleeps and offers excitement around every corner.

name: London
description: Discover the rich history and iconic landmarks of London. Centuries-old architecture meets modern cosmopolitan living.

name: Sydney
description: Enjoy the stunning harbor views and explore the iconic attractions of Sydney. A city known for its vibrant arts scene and outdoor beauty.

name: Kuala Lumpur
description: Experience the blend of modern and traditional charms of Kuala Lumpur. Soaring skyscrapers coexist with historical treasures, creating a unique and dynamic urban experience.
